content: And our compound annual growth rate for the first quarters ended March 31 2019 through March 31 2022 was 88.5%  As of March 31 2022 are backlogs of fully executed contracts for the sale of developed residential lots and single family homes was 20.7 million compared to 19.2 million as of March 31 2021. As of March 31 2022, we had 13 million of availability on the revolving credit facility for total liquidity of $35.2 million. On a quarterly basis revenues increased by approximately 106% to $28.6 million for the three months ended March 31 2022. Our operating expenses increased to 3.8 million for the three months ended March 31 2022, as compared to 2 million for the three months ended March 31 2021. For the three months ended March 31 2022 and 2021 we had basic loss per share of $0.03, and a loss per share of $0.12 respectively. EBITDA for the first quarter of 2022 was $3.5 million, compared to $0.1 million in the first quarter of 2021. Net cash used in operating activities for the quarter ended March 31 2022 was $9.4 million compared to cash used by operating activities of $16.9 million for the quarter ended March 31st 2021. We continue to anticipate adjusted EBITDA of approximately $20 million during 2022, which implies a 34% increase on a year-over-year basis. And as you can see, at the end of March 31 2022, there were approximately $54.8 million fully diluted shares.
